subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Not even 27 points from Richard Jefferson and 25 from Vince Carter could concoct anything sweet for the Nets as they lost their sixth straight to the lowly Charlotte Bobcats on Tuesday night.
snippet: Not even 27 points from Richard Jefferson and 25 from Vince Carter could concoct anything sweet for the Nets as they lost their sixth straight to the lowly Charlotte Bobcats on Tuesday night.
